original: 當然大哥也能發出君主命令要求武將執行任務，君主命令會依照武將的數量和大哥的行動力調整數量和上限。
text: Of course, the eldest brother can also issue a monarch order to request the generals to perform tasks. The monarch order will adjust the number and upper limit according to the number of generals and the eldest brother's action ability.
